content: As an AI language model, I don't have personal opinions or experiences. However, playing basketball does not typically have a direct impact on one's vision. However, it is important to wear protective eyewear to prevent eye injuries that could affect vision. Additionally, if a person wears contact lenses while playing basketball, they may become dry and uncomfortable due to sweating, which could affect their visual acuity. But in general, playing basketball does not have any significant impact on one's vision.
